CustomField.formula: if( TEXT(YEAR(Date_Taken__c)) = "", if(Account__c<>"", HYPERLINK("/appex/cscript/call.htm?page=account_ex&sid=" & Script__c& "&eid=" & Account__c & "&rid=" &Id , "Take Script"), if(Opportunity__c<>"", HYPERLINK("/appex/cscript/call.htm?page=opportunity_ex&sid=" & Script__c& "&eid=" & Opportunity__c & "&rid=" &Id , "Take Script"), if(Lead__c<>"", HYPERLINK("/appex/cscript/call.htm?page=lead_ex&sid=" & Script__c& "&eid=" & Lead__c & "&rid=" &Id , "Take Script"), if(Case__c<>"", HYPERLINK("/appex/cscript/call.htm?page=case_ex&sid=" & Script__c& "&eid=" & Case__c & "&rid=" &Id , "Take Script"), if(Contact__c<>"", HYPERLINK("/appex/cscript/call.htm?page=contact_ex&sid=" & Script__c& "&eid=" & Contact__c & "&rid=" &Id , "Take Script"),"") )))), HYPERLINK("/" & Id, "View Results") )
CustomField.label: Action
